title: GravitySim
description: GravitySim is a physics simulation program I created using C++ and OpenGL. It simulates the gravitational interactions between celestial bodies, allowing users to visualize the dynamics of planetary systems and galaxies. Link to repository: LINK

title: Cyclistic Bike-Share Usage Analysis

title: KickUp
description: I created a web based game in p5.js like the game Kick Up in an attempt to learn progamming for artistic purposes. This is a part of the same learning exploration occuring after the Color Theory project I have here.

title: MineSweeper
description: I developed my version of MineSweeper on my website using just HTML/CSS and Javascript.

title: Color Theory
description: I wanted to explore how to generate color filters in digital media, so I made a tool to demonstrate how, given a specific RGB value, a color is transformed into a grayscale version and and inverse version.
